data.question: What is the empirical formula of AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
What is the crystal system of FeFFIVE-1-Ni?
At what temperature were the single crystal X-ray structure data and refinement conditions for AlFFIVE-1-Ni measured?
What is the calculated density of dehydrated AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
How many water molecules are coordinated to Al3+ in the hydrated form of AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: One water molecule is coordinated to Al3+.

data.question: What is the geometry of Al3+ in the dehydrated form of AlFFIVE-1-Ni according to DFT-optimized structure?
What happens to the Al3+ coordination environment upon dehydration of AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: It changes from a square bi-pyramidal to a trigonal bi-pyramidal geometry.

data.question: Is the FeFFIVE-1-Ni structure isomorphic to the SIFSIX materials?
Does the rehydration of AlFFIVE-1-Ni restore the sixfold coordination state of Al3+?
Can AlFFIVE-1-Ni adsorb CO2 and H2O simultaneously?
Is the heat of adsorption for CO2 higher than that for H2O in AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
Does AlFFIVE-1-Ni show no noticeable adsorption for isobutane and isopropanol?
Is the regeneration temperature for AlFFIVE-1-Ni higher than 150°C?
What is the role of fluorine moieties in the structure of AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: They interact with adsorbed CO2 molecules.

data.question: What is the significance of the steepness in the water adsorption isotherms for AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: It indicates a high affinity for water vapor at very low partial pressures.

data.question: What is the formula weight of FeFFIVE-1-Ni?
What is the absorption coefficient for the as-synthesized AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
Can AlFFIVE-1-Ni be used for the on-demand simultaneous removal of CO2 and H2O?
What is the crystal size of dehydrated AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
What is the effect of CO2 concentration on water breakthrough tests in AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: It shows no noticeable changes on the H2O vapor retention time in the column.
